review: nice a lot of 2010vibes over this one for some reason journey to the west takes place in greybrown post apocalyptic new york with a brodude monkey and a lady youre chucking around like shes a paper airplane   had a fun with it but its not really some deep philosophical story
mmmmm monke  pretty short game 89 hours and with motionsicknessinducing camera but i liked it

its good better than expected  hack and slash good story and voice acting not too short or too long  combat mechanics could be more interesting but its not a bad one  bought in on sale and really worth it
great game just great
fixed camera make it unplayable

i really like the story line and setting but too often the controls are frustrating theres holes in the map you can fall through and its just unpolished it feels like its in beta kind of sad as theres a lot of heart in this but devs really shit the bed on this one not being able to skip 10 minute cut scenes is a crime too

esse jogo tem srios problemas de cmera com ngulos instveis e cortes bruscos na batalha que atrapalham bastante especialmente para quem sofre de cinetose jogar por longos perodos se torna difcil alm disso o jogo perde ritmo no final ficando arrastado e cheio de puzzles repetitivos que quebram a fluidez da histria esses fatores tiram muito do impacto da experincia
8510 cool gem of a game questionable camera and a little repetitive action but great overall

excellent little game  smooth parkour lovely world building art design and great characters also love that the story unfolds itself at the very end making you look at the world through a new lens thank you for that alex garland also the dlc is great as well new style of gameplay same enemies but you gotta deal with them in a new way 810 will replay someday

played this game back in 2014 and got to chapter 2 then stopped because i didnt like how my potato of a laptop wasnt able to handle the graphics  fast forward over a decade and i go through an underappreciated gem of a novel that was buried from the golden era of video games  i truly appreciate the efforts that went into the characters story and gameplay
such a great old school gem  cool storyline easy but cool gameplay interesting characters  highly recommend

this game is a fun linear story it takes you on a journey from post apocalyptic new york city into the uninhabited wastelands of the world the story is engaging and the world still feels very unique and interesting you cant help but get invested and want to learn more about the lore of the world the combat hasnt aged as gracefully as i would have expected it isnt boring or bland but it definitely lacks notes of modern polish not that that detracts from the game it is very of its era
